summary: This dataset contains observations made by the Institute of Ocean Sciences of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) using water samples.
title: Data from Niskin bottle samples
institution: Institute of Ocean Sciences, 9860 West Saanich Road, Sidney, B.C., Canada
keywords: nitrate, nitrite, silicate, phosphate, oxygen, subSurfaceSalinity, subSurfaceTemperature,bottle, conductivity, data, density, depth, salinity, nutrients, Niskin, bottle
